name: Human Development: Childhood and Adolescence
title: SESP SESP 201-0-20 Human Development: Childhood and Adolescence

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
- What's Going on in There? How the Brain and Mind Develop in the First Five Years of Life by Lise Elioth
- Age of Opportunity: Lessons from the New Science of Adolescence by Laurence Steinberg
- Raising Elijah: Protecting Our Children in an Age of Environmental Crisis by Sandra Steingraber

subject: SESP
